attributes.action: Request the Department of Transport to restore the 05.31am from Gatwick to Reading train in the First Great Western franchise agreement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the December 2006 First Great Western rail timetable this early morning commuter service was withdrawn as it was not included in the DfT franchise agreement. This has meant hardship to commuters travelling to Reading and beyond who are required to get to their place of employment at an early hour.
